A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So much fun.  Wonderful movie.  Flawed for sure...  hux shouldn't have been such an dunce\, that casino thing had no center and should have bee A LOT shorter or cut altogether\, Maz's cameo had no place in this move\, and the Leah in space thing was tough to suspend disbelief for...  BUT\, Luke...  amazing Luke+Rey...  amazing.  Rey+Kylo...  amazing.  Luke+kylo...  off the charts amazing.  Kylo's story arch is so\, so\, so good.  Finn is fun.  Chewy fun.  Po Fun.  Action great!  Theme of sacrifice for the team is great.  And all the Jedi order talk with Luke Rey and yoda was great.  The good definitely outweighs the bad with this one.
